      Methods in falstad with parameters of type Robot.Direction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Robot.canSeeGoal(Robot.Direction direction)
      Tells if a sensor can identify the goal in given direction relative to the robot's current forward direction from the current position.
      boolean BasicRobot.canSeeGoal(Robot.Direction direction) 
      int Robot.distanceToObstacle(Robot.Direction direction)
      Tells the distance to an obstacle (a wall or border) in a direction as given and relative to the robot's current forward direction.

      boolean Robot.hasDistanceSensor(Robot.Direction direction)
      Tells if the robot has a distance sensor for the given direction.
      boolean BasicRobot.hasDistanceSensor(Robot.Direction direction)
